title: Jindal Power may join race to buy Lanco Amarkantak
description: JPL has filed a petition with the Amaravati bench of the National Company Law Tribunal for approval to join the auction process of Lanco Amarkantak Power, said people with knowledge of the matter.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
